skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoover wizard
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Hoover AXI washing machine or washer-dryer in an innovative and bespoke way. You can find the best program to use, send commands ask for advice or technical support. 
To use the full features set of Hoover Wizard you must have purchased a Hoover's washing machine or washer-dryer and have created an account using the Hoover Wizard mobile app.

Consult the installation guide and the list of compatible models at the link http://go.candy-group.com/am

About this skill:
The skill support the features available in the Wizard app. Each time you want to interact through Alexa, you’ll need to use ‘Hoover Wizard” as an invocation name to activate the skill.Try saying: “Alexa open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and then ask a question, or pronounce “Alexa ask Hoover Wizard to…”

To get started:
Register your AXI washing machine or your washer-dryer using the Hoover Wizard app on your iOS or Android device.
You can download the complete guide to make the association with Alexa and have the list of compatible models: http://go.candy-group.com/am

If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
“Alexa, ask Hoover Wizard to know what can I ask?” or “Alexa, open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and then ask a question “what can you do?”

You can do various things like:

Manage the washing machine or the washer-dryer remotely: you can quickly start a cycle and stop it at any time.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Wizard to start Wool cycle" or "Alexa, open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and ask “when does the cycle end?"

Know the best program to use just by providing it simple information about what type of garment or fabric do you want to wash.
Try saying: "Alexa, open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and ask “how can I wash jeans and t-shirts?"

Ask for hints on how to treat the most difficult stains or how to take care of special fabrics.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Wizard how to remove chocolate stains" or “Alexa, open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and then ask “can I put perfume on my clothes?”

Know what a specific program does or how you can take care of your washing machine or washer-dryer.
Try saying: "Alexa, open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and then ask “What does the Total Care cycle do?” or “Alexa open Hoover Wizard” wait for the answer and ask “why the door is locked?" or "Alexa, ask Hoover Wizard to know what to do to avoid limescale formation?"

Gimmicks
Try asking Hoover Wizard for some strange questions, it will surprise you
Try saying: "Alexa open Hoover Wizard” wait the answer and then ask “do you like to be an assistant?” or “Alexa ask Hoover Wizard to know if will marry me”
